text: bilshuba Allah tala ne musalmano se un ki jano ko aur un ke malo ko us bath ke ewaz qarid liya hai ke un ko jannath milegi,wo log Allah ki rah mein ladte hai jis mein qatal karte hai aur qatl kiye jate hai,us par saccha wada kiya gaya hai taurath mein aur injeel mein aur Qurâ€™an mein aur Allah se zyada apne ahad ko kaun pora karne wala hai,tuh tum log apni is bae17 par jis ka tum ne mamla tehraya hai khushi manao aur ye badi kamyabi hai
